title: Clubs
content:
lub(In Code Only)

1d4 +1Bludgeoning

Weapon Enchantment +1

Non-Lethality: This weapon deals only Non-Lethal Damage.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Ironwood Harmony: When under the effect of Shillelagh, gains an additional 1d4 Bludgeoning damage.

Torch of True Revocation(In Code Only)

1d6 (1d4) Bludgeoning

Torch of Revocation
